text: I waited for over an hour for my pre-ordered medication, which is both unreasonable and unacceptable. While you ask for our respect, it is equally important to respect our time. The situation is concerning, as my attempts to contact via phone went unanswered. Despite empty counters, numerous patients are left waiting, which raises serious concerns.
Insanely long queue on a Tues afternoon at 3pm. Long q at registration counter and medicine collection. I thot ttsh is worse, i think sgh is worse in this case.

There are many countet staff not doing anything for 5 minutes or more. Not dispensing medicine, while the crowd of patients grows. What are the counter staff waiting for? Is the back end packing of meds too slow. SGH needs to review its system to make the pharmacy more efficient. I've waited 30 mins already.

Generally staffs are nice and efficient but I got a wrong person's queue number when I registered. And I only realized it when try to collect, then they started to prepare my medicine. In the end I waited for 70min. Please train all staffs to check patient's name and IC.
Long wait, but has good supply if medicines and fills outside prescriptions too.
